history.text: Hi, how are you?
Hey! I'm good. I was just reading about a movie, Bruce Almighty. Have you seen it?
I haven't. What's it about?
It's basically about a reported (played by Jim Carrey) who complains to God (Morgan Freeman) about his job. So God tries to help him for a week
But of course since Carrey is the main character, there are a ton of comedic moments between him and Freeman
I love Morgan Freeman haha
Oh. Sounds a little funny. Jim Carrey gets on my nerves a little but I enjoy Morgan Freeman.
Yeah, I can understand that. Honestly I think a lot of people feel that way because the movie only has a 48% on Rotten Tomatoes
I would watch it for Morgan Freeman though.
I mean I like Carrey to an extent, but sometimes he can be annoying, because it's like his humor is always the same. Yeah, and he sounds like what I think God would sound like haha.
Morgan Freeman that is.
Omg haha I think everyone thinks God would sound like Morgan Freeman
Jennifer Aniston and Steve Carell are in it too!
I love Jennifer Aniston, but who doesn't.
I really like them, they probably make up for Carrey's goofiness and make the movie a bit more enjoyable
Who does she play?
She's Carrey's girlfriend haha
But Bruce (Carrey) also has a crush on his co-worker, Susan (played by Catherine Bell)
That would be an odd couple!
I can't place Catherine Bell.
I honestly don't know anything about her. What
What's some of her big movies?
And how do you have another crush if your girlfriend in Aniston lol.
True that haha
Whose big movies? Bell? I don't know who she is.
What is your favorite part of the movie?
Probably just all of the funny stuff Bruce has God do for him to help him out with his job
Like when Bruce makes a co-worker humiliate himself on the air so he gets fired and Bruce can take his job
When did the movie come out? You don't hear much out of Carrey lately it seems.
2003. Definitely older
I think this was right after the Ace Ventura movies
Also I'm pretty sure Carrey's girlfriend passed away recently and they thought he had something to do with it. I can't imagine he'd be filming anything with something like that having just happened
Yeah, I remember reading something about that awhile back.

uid1response.feedback: I think my husband would enjoy this movie. I didn't see a document.
